flawed_nl_solution:
There are currently 9*22=<<9*22=918>>918 episodes out
The new season will have 22+4=<<22+4=26>>26 episodes
So the total number of episodes is 918+26=<<918+26=944>>944 episodes
So it will take 944*0.5=<<944*0.5=472>>472 hours to watch them all
#### 472

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 198, not 918. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
